ISSUE.TITLE: GA ecommerce doesn't work for products without categories
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.4 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Enable "Enable eCommerce" and disable "Use JS to send eCommerce info" 2. Create a product without a category 3. Purchase this product 4. It won't appear in GA e-commerce P.S. It was reproducible on our official website (fixed on October 8th 2021)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5880 from DooVillage/issue-5815-resource-file-casing Issue 5815 Use language id casing for resource file names

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5889 GA ecommerce didn't work for products without categories
